Banner.Description: Welcome to my portfolio! I am a skilled and passionate website developer with a strong background in crafting dynamic and efficient web solutions. My expertise lies in utilizing cutting-edge technologies, with a focus on Angular and ASP.NET C#. With extensive experience in developing robust and scalable web applications, I bring a wealth of knowledge to every project.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my dynamic journey as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have cultivated a relentless passion for learning and growth. Throughout my career, I have dedicated myself to daily training, honing my skills to become a versatile and adaptive professional.

In addition to my technical expertise, I have a knack for implementing system improvements and optimizing websites. I strive to identify and standardize patterns that enhance efficiency and consistency. Moreover, I am proactive in suggesting and executing ideas that bring value to the projects I am involved in.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Front-end Developer | Full-stack web developer
Description: I leveraged my front-end development skills, particularly in Angular, to contribute to web application development for DAFTech, a social impact organization.
My work involved building new features and functionalities, collaborating with a remote team, and writing clean, maintainable code.
I'm proficient in unit testing and debugging to ensure high-quality deliverables.
Developing and implementing new features and functionalities for web applications using Angular and ASP.NET.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Developer
Description: Implementing continuous improvements, working on frontend and backend.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop web applications with node.js and express.js, resulting in a 15% increase in customer satisfaction and retention.

Collaborating with interns and senior developers to brainstorm and implement ideas into web app development resulted in a 30% improvement in app performance and a 25% reduction in load time, enhancing user experience.
Gathering user requirements and building project documentation for a system upgrade, leading to a 30% improvement in system performance and a 25% reduction in system downtime.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Streamlined Business Management (ERP)
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed a comprehensive Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system to centralize and manage critical business functions. This full-stack web application utilizes Angular for a user-friendly front-end experience and ASP.NET Core for a robust and scalable back-end infrastructure.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Team and Project management
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: I have developed a web application that helps big companies to keep track of their employees’ projects and tasks. The app allows admins to assign, approve, and monitor the progress of projects and tasks for their employees. The app also allows employees to create, submit, and view the progress of their own projects and tasks. The app is designed to improve the efficiency and productivity of the workplace by providing a clear and , and easy-to-use interface for managing work.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: SMS Service
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed a user-friendly bulk SMS sender application designed for large organizations. This Angular-based application simplifies bulk SMS communication with a clear and visually appealing interface

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Trans Nation Airways Website
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed a user-friendly and informative website for Trans Nation Airways (TNA), a leading Ethiopian charter airline. The redesigned website streamlines the user experience for both potential customers and existing clients

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: If you're interested in discussing new opportunities, please feel free to reach out. I'll be delighted to receive your contact, and I'll respond promptly upon seeing your message.
